title: LOW ELO GAMES: melee fighter solo mid viable?
body:
For low elo games, I noticed some melee fighter is incredibly effective in mid lane. Champions like Xin Zhao with gap closer can give serious trouble to typical solo mid champions because most of them are squishy mages. Lets discuss the possibility? 

No, I don't think Garen is viable solo mid since he lack a gap closer.

replies.body: Just play DFG Garen mid. Wait........

I just watched Faker-senpai play Lee Sin mid.

IM GONNA COPY IT, IM GONNA REK ALL THE AP MAGES.
Make sure you do that in ranked so that people can provide you with constructive feedback

I've seen Noc be picked quite a bit and it works pretty well considering you can mindlessly push to the turret which is the worst nightmare for an ap enemy mana bar + you can block half a champs burst with a simple spell shield and lets not forget the trusty %%%% drawing skill that lets you speed away when a jungler walks into your lane.

I have nothing against this as long as you have a balanced team composition and you won't like, suffer in team fights because of it or something. A lot of fighters could probably fight against the squishier mages, although I wouldn't suggest those who are liable to be poked down without any hope of fighting back.
